ch0123_00_mizuki/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s be so energized today that we shine even
brighter than the sun and the moon!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0601_0701_01_10:
Of course I’m interested in Pokémon battles,
but there’s another thing I’d like to try while I’m
here on Pasio.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0601_0701_02_10:
And that’s getting more people to use the word
“Alola!” as a greeting!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0601_0701_03_10:
I think it would make people feel happier than just
the usual hello. Why don’t you give it a try?
ch0123_00_mizuki/0602_0701_01_10:
My mom spends most of her time at home with
our Meowth.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0602_0701_02_10:
We brought Meowth with us from Kanto when we
moved to Alola.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0602_0701_03_10:
Mom and Meowth get along so well, I bet they’d
be a sync pair if they came to Pasio!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0602_0701_04_10: I’d love to try battling them as a sync pair!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0603_0701_01_10:
There’s this thing we do in Alola called the
island challenge.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0603_0701_02_10:
We go around to four different islands and take
on trials set by each island’s Trial Captain.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0603_0701_03_10:
It’s not just Pokémon battles—we get tested in a
lot of different ways, and it’s tons of fun!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0603_0701_04_10:
If you visit Alola, you should definitely try it! It’s
my number-one recommendation of all the things
to do there!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0604_0701_01_10:
We have a lot of famous sights and activities in
Alola, but my favorite is the Mantine Surf!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0604_0701_02_10:
We go out surfing on Mantine, build up speed,
and do jumps and flips!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0604_0701_03_10:
And in the end, we dive into the ocean with a
huge splash! *chuckle* It’s hard to land our
tricks sometimes.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], did you know?
In Alola, we have Ride Pokémon that help
people get around the islands.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0605_0701_02_10:
We use Tauros when we need to smash rocks,
Lapras when we need to cross the ocean, and
Charizard to fly around!
ch0123_00_mizuki/0605_0701_03_10:
It’s thanks to all of us working together that I was
able to complete my island challenge.
ch0123_00_mizuki/0605_0701_04_10:
Just thinking about it makes me want to see
them all again!
ch0123_00_mizuki/1701_0701_01_10: Alola! I found something interesting earlier!
ch0123_00_mizuki/1701_0701_02_10: Here, you can have it! Use it well!
ch0123_00_mizuki/1701_0702_01_10: If I find anything else, I’ll let you know!
ch0123_00_mizuki/1701_0702_02_10:
I’m sure I’ll be able to find something that’ll be
useful for you!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2501_0701_01_10: You know, I moved from Kanto to Alola.
ch0123_00_mizuki/2501_0701_02_10:
At first, I was really worried about whether I
would fit in. But everyone was super nice, and
I made a lot of friends really quick!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2501_0701_03_10:
Now, I feel like Alola’s where I belong! I guess
it’s because I keep saying Alola to everyone
every day!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2501_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, people ask me which I like better,
Kanto or Alola.
ch0123_00_mizuki/2501_0702_02_10: But the truth is, I love them both equally!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2501_0702_03_10:
Kanto is Kanto, and Alola is Alola!
Each region has its own charm!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2501_0702_04_10:
I can’t just choose one over the other! That’s why
I like them both!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2511_0701_01_10:
The excitement has been nonstop ever since I
arrived on Pasio!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2511_0701_02_10:
It really reminds me of the island challenge back
in Alola.
ch0123_00_mizuki/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m so lucky to be able to experience this
excitement a second time!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2511_0702_01_10: I’ve made a lot of friends since I came to Pasio.
ch0123_00_mizuki/2511_0702_02_10:
And when we meet up and they say Alola to
me... *chuckle* It makes me so happy!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2511_0702_03_10:
OK! I’m gonna make “Alola” even more of a
buzzword here on Pasio!
ch0123_00_mizuki/2511_0702_04_10:
Say it with me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Ready... Alola!
ch0123_00_mizuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I’m all packed and ready! Where
should we go today? The mountains? The beach?
Ooh, how about the sky?
ch0123_00_mizuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Are you getting hungry? I know I am! Why don’t
we take a break and have some malasadas!
ch0123_00_mizuki/3005_0701_01_10:
What kinds of adventures do you think we’ll have
tomorrow? I’m getting so excited—I don’t know if
I’ll be able to fall asleep tonight!
